definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: Do vomiting and the eyesight that can diarrhoea cause abrupt sex drop?
sentences.chinese: 呕吐和腹泻会引起突然性的视力下降吗？

sentences.english: She has little vision, decreased hearing and cannot speak.
sentences.chinese: 她的视力不佳，听力下降，也不能说话。
白内障会影响你的视力。

sentences.english: The optician says that my vision is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 验光师说我的视力非常好。

sentences.english: Objective To study the poor eyesight situation of the students in the Xingning city and countryside.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解广东省兴宁市城乡中小学生视力不良状况。

sentences.english: Would I have to spend the rest of my life blind in one eye?
sentences.chinese: 我是否要在失去一只眼睛视力的情况下度过余生？

sentences.english: To why protect the student's eyesight to use flaxen paper?
sentences.chinese: 为了保护学生的视力为何采用淡黄色的纸？

sentences.english: A first-grader came to the ophthalmology office where I work to have his vision checked.
sentences.chinese: 一个一年级学生来到我办公的眼科室检查视力。

sentences.english: If they are wearing the glasses normally prescribed for myopia, their vision will deteriorate.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们正常地配戴近视眼睛，他们的视力会恶化。

sentences.english: No permanent reduction in visual acuity and tear film abnormality were observed.
sentences.chinese: 未观察到视力的长期损害及泪膜异常。

sentences.english: To wear corrective lenses when driving.
sentences.chinese: 驾驶时须戴矫正视力的眼镜。

sentences.english: Anything less will be deleted on sight and the uploader warned.
sentences.chinese: 比较少的东西将会在视力上划除和那上传。

sentences.english: And you see here single lines, if you have good eyes.
sentences.chinese: 你看到这个单线，如果你视力够好。

sentences.english: If the operation is a success, Heini should be able to see up to nine meters.
sentences.chinese: 如果手术成功，海尼今后的视力范围可以达到9米远。

sentences.english: I had a test of my eyesight yesterday and I have got more near-sighted.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天测了视力，我近视得更厉害了。

sentences.english: As myopia increases, the eye grows longer than it was ever designed to do.
sentences.chinese: 由于近视眼增加，视力比以前设计的，长得更长。

definition: to lose one's eyesight/to become blind/blindness
ommatidium (single component of insect's compound eye)/one eye (i.e. one's left or right eye)
